mapper.select: SELECT , (SELECT CTGRY_NM FROM FS_BBS_CTGRY WHERE BBS_CTGRY_SN = FS_BBS.BBS_CTGRY_SN) AS ctgryNm FROM FS_BBS

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.* , AA.BBS_SN AS nextBbsSn , AB.BBS_SN AS prevBbsSn FROM ( SELECT , (SELECT CTGRY_NM FROM FS_BBS_CTGRY WHERE BBS_CTGRY_SN = FS_BBS.BBS_CTGRY_SN) AS ctgryNm , (SELECT CTGRY_SUB_NM FROM FS_BBS_CTGRY_SUB WHERE BBS_CTGRY_SUB_SN = FS_BBS.BBS_CTGRY_SUB_SN) AS ctgrySubNm , @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS rnum FROM FS_BBS, (SELECT @rownum:=0) TMP
ORDER BY BBS_BEST_SN DESC, BBS_ORDR ASC ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT BBS_SN , @rownumA:=@rownumA+1 AS rnum FROM FS_BBS, (SELECT @rownumA:=0) TMP
ORDER BY BBS_BEST_SN DESC, BBS_ORDR ASC ) T ) AA ON (AA.rnum = (A.rnum - 1)) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT BBS_SN , @rownumB:=@rownumB+1 AS rnum FROM FS_BBS, (SELECT @rownumB:=0) TMP
ORDER BY BBS_BEST_SN DESC, BBS_ORDR ASC ) T ) AB ON (AB.rnum = (A.rnum + 1)) ) B WHERE B.bbsSn = #{bbsSn}
